title: Rider transfer ticker: Landa to Soudal Quick-Step, Martínez to Bora-Hansgrohe, Walscheid to Jayco-AlUla, Consonni latest for Lidl-Trek
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Landa to Soudal Quick-Step, Martínez to Bora-Hansgrohe, Walscheid to Jayco-AlUla, Consonni latest for Lidl-Trek on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
